node.title: Creating a base Virtual Machine in VirtualBox
node.excerpt: Starting with a base VM gives you a lot of flexibility in the future through cloning. Learn how to create a new VM in VirtualBox and use it as a stable base for future projects.

node.title: Creating a web development environment with VirtualBox
node.excerpt: Getting started with virtualization can be tricky. This guide will show you how to get up and running with VirtualBox.
